title: The Tricky Family Table
description: Two tables, eight guests, and a lifetime of tiny grudges. Can you keep the peace?
clues: Amy and Liam sit together at the top table, but not at the ends.
Nana refuses to sit anywhere except the very first seat on the top table.
Uncle Joe must sit opposite Nana at the other end of the top table.
The DJ needs to sit closest to the dance floor at the Friends Table – that’s the last seat.
Sam and Zoe want to sit together so they can gossip about the music.
Cousin Mia is the first to sit down at the Friends Table.
hints: Seat Nana and Uncle Joe at opposite ends of the top table first.
If Amy and Liam sit together in the middle, that leaves only two end seats for Nana and Uncle Joe.
Start the Friends Table by placing Cousin Mia in Seat 1 and the DJ in Seat 4.
